ygData.subject: Re: Bard Revenge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ll save the surprise of the lake for you... swim along the bottom, though... heheh. Ah well, can t swim across zones.  If we could, that s the way I
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

>So what's in the lake in the West Commons anyway? Can you zone to/from the
>Ocean Of Tears? Who needs a stinky boat - I'm swimming from Freeport to
>Butcherblock!


I'll save the surprise of the lake for you... swim along the bottom,
though... heheh.

Ah well, can't swim across zones. If we could, that's the way I would
travel through the ocean o tears for sure!

>PSS: Does anyone else think that there should be a merchant or a bar in the
>boat? I'd love to see some drunken Bards roaming around the deck.. playing
>silly songs.. falling off.. trying to swim while drunk..


I was drunk and fell off the boat once. It almost seems like there was
meant to be an NPC bartender down there, doesn't it? Ever notice you cannot
trade, while on the boat? Or drop anything? Casters can't cast spells...
but bards can sing songs? (That should be something to keep in mind if you
play on the racewar server... denon's anyone? hehe) However that crazy code
works for boats, probably won't allow NPCs.
>
>PSSS: Does anyone else think it would be the greatest thing to have an
>undead ferryman that you had to give a copper or silver to in order to get
>across the rivers around Antonica? Could even make it some Spectre type
>thing like the river Styx.. The things you think about while running nekkid
>from Freeport to Qeynos screaming Selo's eh?


A fine idea! But really, the ferryman should be somewhere on one of the
planes! Anyone else jacked up about the plane of FEAR opening tomorrow? I
for one am going in there naked with a drum and a minotaur horn... scout
around a little! Fear would be entered through Oasis I presume. O how the
spectres will be running around the beach tomorrow I have a feeling!

Roop
